title: feature_scoring_vs_zeros
description: Due to leaks found in the past week, I wondered how it would modify the simple XGB scoring method demonstrated in this notebook. For this purpose I use the results found in : https://www.kaggle.com/johnfarrell/breaking-lb-fresh-start-with-lag-selection/output
